bannerCard.title: Easy to use
bannerCard.bodyText: Each of these components can be dragged and dropped via the CMS and has fully customisable content.

bannerCard.title: Custom sections
bannerCard.bodyText: Every page section and be added, removed and modified.

bannerCard.title: JAM Stack
bannerCard.bodyText: JAM stands for JavaScript, API, Markup. JAM enables enterprise level companies to benefit from great SEO, fast load times, scalability and ease of use that working with static files.

bannerCard.title: User variables
bannerCard.bodyText: Variables can be exposed to the CMS if required and can offer greater levels of control without bloating file size.

bannerCard.title: CSS Grid layout
bannerCard.bodyText: All components are positioned on the same grid using CSS Grid layout.

bannerCard.title: Good SEO
bannerCard.bodyText: As Hugo renders static HTML pages the site is great for SEO out of the box.

bannerCard.title: Fast development
bannerCard.bodyText: Working with a serverless environment means one Front End developer can rapidly iterate.

bannerCard.title: Go modules
bannerCard.bodyText: Hugo utilises Go modules to import reusable code from a central repo meaning multiple websites can be managed with a single framwork.

homeContentList.title: User editable menus
homeContentList.bodyText: All menus are drag and drop and can contain multiple types of links.

homeContentList.title: Find out more
homeContentList.textSupporting: Read about the tech stack here
